actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Riegle and Senator Levin in "Lawrence Jasper and Family U.S.A. v. Federal National Mortgage Association, et al.," Civil Action No. 83-2896DT.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senators Riegle and Levin and their staffs in the case of Lawrence Jasper & Family U.S.A. v. Federal National Mortgage Association, et al. Authorizes such persons to testify and produce documents in such case, except concerning matters determined privileged from disclosure, and except when the Senators' attendance is necessary at the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Riegle and Senator Levin in "Lawrence Jasper and Family U.S.A. v. Federal National Mortgage Association, et al.," Civil Action No. 83-2896DT.
